scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of Winston Curchill consists of one letter.

did.unittitle: Letter to Glen Walton Blodgett 1928 May 4

scopecontent.p: Churchill refers to a poem sent by Blodgett and encloses an autograph
